Articles.Content: I took some screenshots on Space Engine from different locations. You can see them here: http://imgur.com/a/3FelB#0
These are some really cool pictures. Very realistic graphics. I wish I could run Space Engine, but unfortunately I have an integrated Intel graphics card.

These are some really cool pictures. Very realistic graphics. I wish I could run Space Engine, but unfortunately I have an integrated Intel graphics card.

Same here.

That's the only thing holding me from playing real games on my "gaming" laptop.
Gaming laptop? Are you sure you don't have a nVidia GT---- hiding under poor Windows UI?

http://h10025.www1.hp.com/ewfrf/wc/document?cc=us&lc=en&dlc=en&tmp_geoLoc=true&docname=c03083254

Here's my laptop.

I've heard you can "dedicate" more video memory by accessing the BIOS, but as you've probably noticed, I'm no computer scientist.
